hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Wallet#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Hookshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the earth is round.^Just like pizza.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
